path.style: vector-effect: none; opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0.5px; fill: rgb(99, 110, 250); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 20px; fill: rgb(42, 63, 95); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
